K-DASH Dresses And Skirts

VN:F [1.9.22_1171]
please wait...
Rating: 6.6/10 (48 votes cast)

K-DASH Dresses and Skirts are in hot in any season. Stay looking good and in style with these KDASH dresses and skirts. K-DASH is the Kardashian Clothing line that is exclusive with the QVC network. Clicking through on any of the KDASH items will take you to the QVC.com K-DASH item directly. Kim Kardashian is involved in style selection and design along with sisters Kourtney and Kloe Kardashian. All of the Kardashians endorse the K-DASH line and promote it on television segments often. These K-DASH dresses and skirts from the K-DASH Clothing line are the closest you will find online – to the hot dresses and skirts at the DASH Clothing Boutiques.

DASH LA – DASH Miami – DASH NYC

DASH Boutiques are often featured on the popular television show “Keeping Up With The Kardashians”. K-DASH can help you Keep Up With The Kardashians Fashions. Comment below on your favorite K-DASH Dresses or Skirts.

K-DASH Dresses

K-DASH by Kardashian Bandeau Top Maxi Dress

Style to the max. You’ll look effortlessly chic in this maxi dress, which catches the eye with its sensational, allover print. Designed with a tie-back bandeau top, this showstopper is perfect for barbecue parties, the beach, and any stop in between. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Bandeau Top Maxi Dress



K-DASH by Kardashian Bandeau Top Maxi Dress

K-DASH by Kardashian Sequin Dress with Knit Side Panel

Night on the town. Fabulous versatility is what this sleeveless sequined dress has to offer–in droves. From sipping cocktails at a soiree to dancing the night away at a club, it keeps you comfortable all evening long thanks to side knit panels. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Sequin Dress with Knit Side Panel



K-DASH by Kardashian Sequin Dress with Knit Side Panel

K-DASH by Kardashian Printed One Shoulder Maxi Dress

Wow-worthy. For an evening out, nothing beats the drama of this one-shoulder printed maxi dress. Gathered at the chest, the glamorous piece transitions into an A-line to flatter your silhouette. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Printed One Shoulder Maxi Dress



K-DASH by Kardashian Printed One Shoulder Maxi Dress

K-DASH by Kardashian Long Sleeve Knit Dressw/ Shoulder Detail

A dress to impress. Beautiful in its simplicity, this long-sleeved, scoop-necked dress goes beyond basic, thanks to detailing at the shoulder. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Long Sleeve Knit Dressw/ Shoulder



K-DASH by Kardashian Long Sleeve Knit Dressw/ Shoulder Detail

K-DASH by Kardashian Gathered Knit Dress

Show off your spectacular silhouette in this gathered knit dress. The ruched sides and ample dose of spandex ensure it hugs your curves in all the right places. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Gathered Knit Dress



K-DASH by Kardashian Gathered Knit Dress

K-DASH by Kardashian Maxi Dress with Elastic Waist

Fast becoming an iconic summer staple, the maxi dress is a must for your warm-weather wardrobe. This updated version features a tube top-style neckline with an elastic band and built-in shelf for comfort and support. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Maxi Dress with Elastic Waist



K-DASH by Kardashian Maxi Dress with Elastic Waist

K-DASH by Kardashian Gathered Knit Leopard Print Dress

On the prowl. Stop them in their tracks in this bold, leopard-print dress. Cap sleeves and a jewel neckline add sophistication to the alluring design, while side ruching flatters your shape. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Gathered Knit Leopard Print Dress



K-DASH by Kardashian Gathered Knit Leopard Print Dress

K-DASH by Kardashian Printed Kaftan with Waist Tie Detail

Light, airy, and easy to wear. Perfect for warmer weather, this printed kaftan will keep you comfy and chic with a front tie at the waist, a V-neckline, and sheer bell sleeves. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Printed Kaftan with Waist Tie Detail



K-DASH by Kardashian Printed Kaftan with Waist Tie Detail

K-DASH by Kardashian Ponte Knit Dress with Cap Sleeves

Done in a classic cut that never goes out of style, this ponte knit dress takes you from work to weekend with zero effort. Pair it with flats for a more casual look, or slip on those fabulous heels and a jacket for a special occasion. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Ponte Knit Dress with Cap Sleeves



K-DASH by Kardashian Ponte Knit Dress with Cap Sleeves

K-DASH by Kardashian 3/4 Sleeve Scoop Neck Sequin Dress

Get noticed. Covered in sparkles, this sequin dress is sure to make you the life of the party. A scoop neckline and 3/4 length sleeves add classic style and versatility to the glam look. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH 3/4 Sleeve Scoop Neck Sequin Dress - Kardashian Clothing



K-DASH by Kardashian 3/4 Sleeve Scoop Neck Sequin Dress

K-DASH Skirts

K-DASH by Kardashian Button Front Tie Waist Romper

Pair this adorable romper with some wedge sandals and a large, colorful hobo for a look that embraces summer fun. A tie waist creates a must-have silhouette, while the faux cuff details add a casual touch. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Button Front Tie Waist Romper



K-DASH by Kardashian Button Front Tie Waist Romper

K-DASH by Kardashian Knit Skirt with Pleating Detail

Classic, with a feminine touch. Perfect your glamorous look with this knit skirt. Pleated details on the front and a flat elastic waistband flatter your figure and keep you stylish. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Knit Skirt with Pleating Detail



K-DASH by Kardashian Knit Skirt with Pleating Detail

K-DASH by Kardashian Sequin Skirt with Elastic Waistband

No one will call you ma’am when you step out in this shimmering, sequined skirt. It’s a totally transformative piece that takes you from demure dame to dramatic diva in an flash. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Sequin Skirt with Elastic Waistband



K-DASH by Kardashian Sequin Skirt with Elastic Waistband

K-DASH by Kardashian Button Front Coat with Pleated Skirt

If you hate covering up your perfectly planned outfit with unflattering outwear, then this is the coat for you. It’s designed with a gorgeous spread collar and a pleated skirt to give you the weather protection you need and a look you’ll love. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Button Front Coat with Pleated Skirt



K-DASH by Kardashian Button Front Coat with Pleated Skirt

K-DASH by Kardashian Stretch Knit Pencil Skirt w/ Seam Detail

Stylish staple. Nothing goes from day to evening better than a pencil skirt. A wardrobe must-have, this classy classic, crafted in stretch-knit fabric, features front and back seaming details for a flattering silhouette. From K-DASH by Kardashian.


K-DASH by Kardashian Stretch Knit Pencil Skirt w/ Seam Detail
